## An Online Permit and Monitoring System for Implementation of the Nagoya Protocol

This project site is the home of a proposal for model Online Research Permit and Monitoring System to assist Parties to the [Nagoya Protocol on Access to Genetic Resources and the Fair and Equitable Sharing of Benefits Arising from their Utilization](https://www.cbd.int/abs/about/) to the [United Nations Convention on Biological Diversity](https://www.cbd.int). 

The model is a work in progress and will be periodically updated based on comments received. 
The proposal is available in a number of formats.
